What Makes Us Proud

About Us

At CargoPro, we are committed to transforming the freight and logistics industry with intelligent technology. As a modern Transportation Management System (TMS) provider, CargoPro helps businesses across industries automate and optimize their end-to-end logistics operations. Our platform covers everything from freight sourcing to final delivery, ensuring that logistics operations run smoothly with enhanced speed, visibility, and control.
CargoPro is built on powerful AI, real-time tracking, and an intuitive interface, all designed to simplify complex logistics challenges. Our platform offers everything from freight sourcing, invoice reconciliation, automated indent approval, live tracking, and more.

Automated Solutions for Your Logistics Operations

All in One Dashboard

Gain full control of your supply chain with CargoPro's smart dashboard. Access real-time data and automation tools for streamlined logistics management.

Analytics

Access vital logistics insights with our analytics feature. Monitor placement efficiency, ratings, loading/unloading times, halt durations, transit details, and turnaround for optimized operations.

Live Tracking

Enable transparent vehicle operations with SIM-based tracking. Monitor real-time vehicle locations, routes, stops, and status using integrated SIM cards and GPS technology.

Freight Sourcing and Reverse Auction

Access our platform to connect with top Transporters and new opportunities. Utilize reverse auctions for efficient freight procurement and cost savings.

Indent Automation

Automate procurement workflows with our platform. Streamline indent management, approval routing, and PO generation for enhanced efficiency and control.

Electronic Proof of Delivery

Verify goods delivery with proof of delivery (POD). Access delivery receipts, signatures, and timestamps for accurate transactions.

In Plant Movement and Optimization

Enhance Plant Efficiency with Real-Time Vehicle Monitoring. Optimize In-Plant Movement for Streamlined Operations and Cost Savings.

Reconciliation of Freight

Automate freight invoice verification and rate matching. Simplify handling invoices from Logistics Service Providers (Transporters) with accurate bill verification.

Why Choose us?

Unified Logistics Platform:

Whether it’s road, air, or sea freight, manage all your shipments on one powerful, easy-to-use platform. No need for multiple systems to handle different transport modes.

Smart Automation

CargoPro automates time-consuming tasks like indent approvals, invoice validation, and fund disbursement, allowing your team to focus on what really matters.

Real-Time Control Center

Gain complete visibility of your shipments at every point in the journey. Real-time alerts, SIM/GPS-based tracking, and proactive notifications keep you in the loop at all times.

How it Works?
